channel.title: Software Review on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: The best JavaScript IDE
item.description: Disclaimer: I was asked to write a review by WebStorm for a free open source license. With that said you will always get my honest feedback about the pros and cons about these editors. About a month ago I started writing the new AngularJS based spa app for Exceptionless 2.0. While learning about AngularJS I looked around and used several editors to see which one worked the best. I’ll break down the editors that I used and conclude which one I liked the best.
